translation.es: Pero, en fin, no es nada gracioso el tema del pelo de las mujeres negras. Dios mío, no tenía idea.

translation.en: I mean, it really blew my mind.
You know, the energy and the time
and the… the pain and the suffering that Black women go through.
translation.es: Y el dolor y el sufrimiento por el que pasan las mujeres negras.

translation.en: And so, anyway, I just wanted to be well-versed
translation.es: Bueno, solo quería estar bien informada para cuando te volviera a ver.

translation.en: for when I saw you next, and I'll let you get back to it.
translation.es: Bueno, solo quería estar bien informada para cuando te volviera a ver. Ya te dejo ir.

translation.en: Yeah, and-- but before you go, can you just tell me…
[exhales] What is this style? Just so I know for next time.
-Shelley, I'm not a toy. -[Shelley] Because I--
I really don't appreciate you treating me
translation.es: No me gusta nada que me trates

translation.en: like some shiny little object you can show off to your friends.
translation.es: como un objeto brillante del que presumes con tus amigos.

translation.en: Oh, no, I would never do anything like that.
-[Amira] No, you are. -No--
-[Amira] Just let me finish. Yes, you do. -Oh, no, I--
translation.es: - Yo no… - ¿Me dejas terminar? Lo haces.

translation.en: Since I met you, I've been nothing but kind and respectful.
translation.es: Desde que te conocí, solo he sido amable y respetuosa.

translation.en: And it's starting to feel like you're all happy that you have this Black daughter-in-law
translation.es: Pero pareciera que estás feliz de tener una nuera negra

translation.en: now that it's cool to care about Black people.
translation.es: ahora que es cool preocuparse por los negros.

translation.en: I bet every time we hang out, you tell one of your friends,
translation.es: Apuesto que, cuando salimos, les cuentas a tus amigos.

translation.en: and I can guarantee you that what you don't tell them is that every time we hang out,
translation.es: Pero estoy segura de que no les dices que, cada vez que salimos,

translation.en: you are wildly offensive and incredibly inappropriate.
translation.es: eres sumamente ofensiva y tremendamente desubicada.

translation.en: -Well, I'm not-- -[Amira] Oh, and now you're gonna cry.
translation.es: - Yo… - Y ahora vas a llorar.

translation.en: You're gonna clutch your pearls and play the victim as if everything I just said, none of that was valid.
translation.es: Te vas a hacer la víctima, como si todo lo que dije no fuera válido.

translation.en: My feelings are not valid.
translation.es: Lo que siento no es válido,

translation.en: Your feelings are hurt.
-Am I being too aggressive with you? -[splutters]
[Amira] Am I giving you "angry"?
The crazy thing is that I really genuinely wanted to get to know you, woman to woman.
translation.es: Lo loco es que yo realmente quería conocerte, de mujer a mujer.

translation.en: I thought you would see me.
-That's what I-- -[Amira] No, it's not.
translation.es: - Eso es lo que… - No, no lo es.

translation.en: Because you can't just see me for me.
translation.es: Porque no puedes verme por quien soy.

translation.en: It doesn't matter how many books you read or how many documentaries that you watch,
translation.es: No importa cuántos libros leas ni cuántos documentales veas,

translation.en: because at the end of the day, I won't just be Amira to you.
translation.es: porque, al fin y al cabo, nunca seré solo Amira para ti.

translation.en: I'll always be Amira, the Black token daughter-in-law,
translation.es: Siempre seré Amira, la nuera negra,

translation.en: and that's ignorant.
Amira, are you okay?
Not really.
-Miss Shelley, are you okay? -Mm-hmm.
All right. Uh, Amira, honey.
[both] Can I talk to you for a second?
Yes.
[gasps] You wanna go first?
-I do, but it sounds like you do too. -I do. [exhales]
translation.es: Sí, pero creo que tú también. Sí.

translation.en: I don't know how this is gonna work.
translation.es: No sé cómo hacer funcionar esto.

translation.en: Okay.
[Amira] It's just…
You know, your family,
my family, the whole thing,
I don't know if it's supposed to be this hard,
translation.es: No sé si debería ser tan difícil.

translation.en: and if I'm being honest, I just…
Oh, God, I don't have it in me.
I'm so sorry.
Uh, I don't disagree.
The stuff with our families, like…
my mom, your dad.
Yeah, I guess I don't see it changing, so…
translation.es: Sí, no creo que cambie, así que…

translation.en: I do, uh, I do want you to know that,
uh, this time with you has been, like, the happiest time of my life, so…
translation.es: que este tiempo contigo fue el más feliz de mi vida.

translation.en: I feel the same way. [sobs]
Okay.
[Ezra] I've been thinking about something you said.
[Mo] Nigga, if I had a dollar for every time I heard that one.
translation.es: Ojalá me dieran un dólar cada vez que me dicen eso.

translation.en: [Ezra] You're extremely unlikable. You know that, right?
-What? -Whoa-ho!
[Mo] Anyways, what did I say that's been profoundly rattling around in your consciousness?
translation.es: En fin, ¿qué dije que te quedó dando tantas vueltas en la cabeza?

translation.en: You said that Black people and white people could never be cool,
translation.es: Dijiste que los negros y los blancos nunca podrán llevarse bien,

translation.en: and I think you're right.
[scoffs] Yeah, bro, of course I was right.
translation.es: Sí, hermano, claro que tenía razón.

translation.en: I'm always right.
[chuckles] Is that what's bothering you? That I'm always right?
translation.es: ¿Eso te molesta? ¿Que yo siempre tenga razón?

translation.en: [Ezra] No, what's bothering me is, for a second, I believed you were wrong.
translation.es: No, me molesta que, por un momento, creí que estabas equivocada

translation.en: That there was hope for us. For the future.
translation.es: y que había esperanza para nosotros, para el futuro.

translation.en: [Ezra] That when two people from two different walks of life came together,
translation.es: Que, cuando dos personas de mundos distintos se unían,

translation.en: they could get by on their compassion for one another
translation.es: podían salir adelante gracias a su compasión,

translation.en: and their curiosity and their love.
translation.es: su curiosidad y su amor mutuos.

translation.en: But at the end of the day, when it comes to Black and white people,
translation.es: Pero, al final, cuando se trata de blancos y negros,

translation.en: I don't think love is enough.
translation.es: creo que el amor no es suficiente.

translation.en: There's too many other outside factors.
Whether it be your friends or your family,
translation.es: Así sean tus amigos o tu familia,

translation.en: people can't accept what they don't understand.
translation.es: la gente no puede aceptar lo que no entiende.

translation.en: Whether it's right is one thing, but factually, it's true.
translation.es: Que esté bien o no es otra cosa, pero es la verdad.

translation.en: We really do live in two worlds.
There's no escaping it.
I was raised by hip-hop shit.
translation.es: Yo me crie con el hip hop, eso me hizo ser quien soy.

translation.en: It's made me who I am, but even with that,
translation.es: Yo me crie con el hip hop, eso me hizo ser quien soy. Pero, aun así,

translation.en: I still wasn't prepared for the realities of a world I'm just not from.
translation.es: no estaba preparado para la realidad de un mundo al que soy ajeno.

translation.en: I'll always be an outsider.
Which is why, as fucked up as this sounds,
translation.es: Por eso, por más retorcido que suene,

translation.en: I feel like if you love something,
as much as you wanna share it with everybody,
I think it's best you keep it for yourself.
translation.es: es mejor que te lo guardes.

translation.en: See, I told you. The white Barry White, he be spitting some shit!
translation.es: Te dije que el Barry White blanco podía ser profundo.

translation.en: Him and Joe Rogan.
I ain't mad at Joe Rogan for saying "nigga" every other word,
translation.es: No me enoja que Rogan sea ofensivo en su pódcast

translation.en: long as he don't say that shit in my face.
translation.es: mientras no diga esas cosas en mi cara.

translation.en: Man, you kind of dragged bruh a little bit.
What are you talking about? Ezra? I ain't drag him.
You drug him like a fat bitch's left foot.
translation.es: Lo humillaste como a una perra.

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no, you can miss me with all that shit.
translation.es: No, no, no me salgas con esa mierda.

translation.en: I did exactly what any father would do.
translation.es: Hice lo que haría cualquier padre.

translation.en: [chuckles] You played him like a white boy,
translation.es: Jugaste con él porque sabías que podías.

translation.en: 'cause you knew you could get away with it. Tell the truth!
translation.es: Jugaste con él porque sabías que podías. ¡Confiesa!

translation.en: Oh, you would've handled it differently?
I would've got a car out of his ass.
I'd have probably started me a line of credit,
translation.es: Habría solicitado una línea de crédito

translation.en: probably got me a washer and dryer, probably a bottle of cologne.
translation.es: y me habría comprado una lavadora, una secadora, un perfume.

translation.en: Try to get my back patio done.
This is the stuff that he probably wanna do. You in your own reality, huh?
translation.es: - Todo lo que él debía querer hacer… - ¿Vives en otra realidad?

translation.en: That shit ain't gonna happen.
It don't matter what I would've did.
translation.es: No importa lo que habría hecho yo.

translation.en: Times have changed. The world is different, Woody.
Akbar, bitch. My name is Akbar.
-It's the same amount of syllables-- -See? See?
You didn't see what I saw.
translation.es: Tú no viste lo que yo vi.

translation.en: Him and his friends, the degenerates, was doing so much cocaine in Vegas,
translation.es: Con toda la coca que consumieron él y sus amigos en Las Vegas,

translation.en: it looked like they was doing a reboot of Scarface.
So that's what it's about? Cocaine?
Yes, that's one of the main reasons. Yes, cocaine.
translation.es: Sí, es una de las razones. Sí, cocaína.

translation.en: He was doing not just cocaine. Lots of cocaine.
translation.es: No era solo cocaína, era mucha cocaína.

translation.en: It was copious amounts of cocaine, everywhere.
translation.es: Había un montón de cocaína por todas partes.

translation.en: He did so much cocaine, he shit on hisself!
translation.es: ¡Consumió tanta cocaína que se cagó encima!

translation.en: -You seen him shit on hisself? -No, I ain't see him shit on hisself.
translation.es: - ¿Lo viste cagarse encima? - No, no lo vi.

translation.en: But I heard about the other time when he was there and he shit on hisself,
translation.es: Pero contaron que se cagó encima la otra vez que estuvo ahí,

translation.en: and everybody still talks about it. -So the whole town knows. -[laughs]
translation.es: y aún hablan de eso, todos lo saben.

translation.en: How we gonna be falling in the spot with this nigga?
translation.es: ¿Cómo vamos a ser familia de un tipo así?

translation.en: [EJ] Wow.
Look, I'm not saying it's right, but you did your shit back in the day.
translation.es: Mira, no digo que esté bien, pero tú hiciste lo tuyo de joven.

translation.en: You remember they came out with the Cold Blooded Rick James album?
translation.es: ¿Recuerdas cuando salió el álbum Cold Blooded, de Rick James?

translation.en: No, I don't remember the Cold Blooded Rick James album.
translation.es: No, no recuerdo ese álbum de Rick James.

translation.en: Okay, but coke do.
Man, we loved that album.
That was the only time I felt related to you.
translation.es: Fue la única vez que nos sentí hermanos.

translation.en: And I think you shorted him a little bit.
Yeah, you… you shorted him.
And… And you shorted Amira.
Shorted both of 'em.
Can you please stop smiling so big? -You're freaking out the locals. -What?
translation.es: Ya no sonrías así, estás asustando a la gente.

translation.en: Well, I'm excited that my son is gonna buy me some tennis shoes.
translation.es: Estoy emocionada porque mi hijo me va a comprar unos tenis.

translation.en: [scoffs] I just don't understand why all of a sudden you need a pair of Dunks so badly.
translation.es: No entiendo por qué de pronto necesitas tanto unos Nike.

translation.en: Because Diane Kaplan's son bought her a pair of tennis shoes
translation.es: Porque el hijo de Diane Kaplan le compró un par,

translation.en: and the bitch won't stop talking about it.
translation.es: y la perra solo habla de eso.

translation.en: Oh, shit.
What?
Oh, well, that's cool. We can just go in and get the shoes, doesn't matter.
translation.es: Está bien. Entremos y compremos los tenis, no importa.

translation.en: I think you gotta let Diane one up you on this one, Mom.
translation.es: Tendrás que dejar que Diane te gane en esto. No quiero…

translation.en: -I don't really wanna-- -[Shelley] It's…
translation.es: Tendrás que dejar que Diane te gane en esto. No quiero… Es…

translation.en: Ezra?
Oh, uh, Amira, what's up, girl?
Mm. "What's up, girl"?
Why are you sounding like LL Cool J? What's up?
translation.es: ¿Por qué hablas como LL Cool J? ¿Cómo estás?

translation.en: Sorry, I just wasn't expecting to run into you here.
I mean, yeah, same.
Daddy, what's going on?
Oh, fuck me.
Good timing.
Yeah. Okay, I didn't bring you here to buy me shoes.
translation.es: Sí. Bueno, no te traje aquí para que me compraras unos tenis.

translation.en: -Yeah, starting to put that together. -Yeah.
Yeah, and, baby girl, I don't know what I told you to get you down here,
translation.es: Y, nena, no sé qué te dije para que vinieras,

translation.en: but whatever it was, it was a lie.
The truth is Shelley and I have been talking.
translation.es: La verdad es que Shelley y yo estuvimos hablando.

translation.en: Yep. Uh, we screwed up, you guys.
-Badly. -Yeah.
And we feel like we owe y'all some apologies.
translation.es: Sentimos que les debemos una disculpa.

translation.en: -Can I go first? -[Shelley] Yeah, please, go, go.
Ezra.
Brother.
Man, listen.
I been riding your back from the moment we first met,
translation.es: te estuve molestando desde que nos conocimos,

translation.en: and I'm sorry.
'Cause you didn't deserve that.
It's just I couldn't handle the fact that you weren't
translation.es: Es que no podía aceptar que no fueras

translation.en: what we ever thought Amira would bring home and, uh, you know…
translation.es: como el hombre que siempre pensamos que Amira traería a casa.

translation.en: And I never ever thought that I could see my reflection in you, so…
translation.es: Y nunca pensé que podría verme reflejado en ti,

translation.en: But I do.
And you're a good man.
And a hustler.
And most importantly,
we both love Amira very much, and we'll do anything to make her happy.
translation.es: es que ambos amamos a Amira y haríamos lo que sea para hacerla feliz.

translation.en: [sighs] Okay, it's my turn.
Um, Amira.
[inhales] I am so sorry for everything that I did
translation.es: lamento muchísimo todo lo que hice y dije que fue ofensivo para ti.

translation.en: and said that was offensive to you.
translation.es: todo lo que hice y dije que fue ofensivo para ti.

translation.en: The truth is I… I was just lost.
translation.es: La verdad es… que estaba perdida.

translation.en: You know, my son came home with this beautiful, amazing woman,
translation.es: Mi hijo trajo a casa a una mujer hermosa y maravillosa,

translation.en: and I didn't know anything about her world.
translation.es: y yo no sabía nada sobre su mundo.

translation.en: I mean, I thought I did.
And I was just so excited to have a new and different culture in our family,
translation.es: Me emocionaba mucho tener a alguien de otra cultura en la familia.

translation.en: and I just hope that you accept my apology,
translation.es: Y espero que aceptes mi disculpa,

translation.en: because I do apologize on behalf of all white people.
translation.es: porque me disculpo en nombre de todos los blancos.

translation.en: Except for the racist ones, the actual racist ones.
translation.es: Excepto los que son racistas de verdad.

translation.en: -[chuckles] -And on behalf of all Jewish people.
translation.es: Y en nombre de todos los judíos,

translation.en: Except for Aunt Mitzi because…
-Yeah, she's racist. -She's actually racist.
She's a horrible human being. [sighs]
But really mostly on behalf of me,
translation.es: Pero, sobre todo, en mi nombre,

translation.en: Shelley Cohen of Brentwood, California.
I am so sorry, Amira,
because I love you and you are not a toy.
translation.es: porque te quiero y no eres un juguete.

translation.en: I see you as the real, powerful,
translation.es: Te veo como la persona real,

translation.en: individual person that you are.
Thank you so much, Miss Shelley, that means a lot to me.
translation.es: Gracias, señora Shelley. Eso significa mucho para mí.

translation.en: And I fully receive that.
It felt very genuine and sincere,
translation.es: Se sintió muy genuino y sincero,

translation.en: so thank you so much.
And, Ezzy.
[exhales] I'm also sorry for always getting in the way.
translation.es: lamento mucho entrometerme siempre en todo.

translation.en: No, you're not.
I'm not, honey, but I love you.
-Yeah. I love you too. -I love you, baby, very much.
translation.es: - Sí, yo también. - Te quiero mucho, bebé.

translation.en: Okay, so…
Akbar and I had a little idea.
translation.es: Akbar y yo tuvimos una idea.

translation.en: Yes, and we think you're both gonna like it very much.
translation.es: Sí, y creemos que les gustará mucho.

translation.en: A lot.
So, did you miss me as much as I missed you?
translation.es: Y… ¿me extrañaste tanto como yo a ti?

translation.en: I missed you so much.
I even got a pair of slides the other day 'cause I wanted to feel close to you.
translation.es: Hasta me compré unas sandalias para sentirte cerca.

translation.en: -[laughs] Eww! -They were Umbros. It was all they had.
-I know. -No.
-I got 'em 'cause I was so sad. -Aww.
-[Ezra] Missed you. -I missed you too.
I love you.
[rabbi] Blessings to all who are present
translation.es: Bendiciones para todos los que vinieron

translation.en: to witness Ezra and Amira unite their lives in marriage.
translation.es: a ver cómo Ezra y Amira unen sus vidas en matrimonio.

translation.en: Two hearts as one.
Ezra and Amira, you choose each other to build a home,
translation.es: Ezra y Amira, se eligen mutuamente para construir un hogar,

translation.en: not of brick and mortar, but a home and haven in your hearts together.
translation.es: no de ladrillo y cemento, sino un hogar en sus corazones.

translation.en: May it be fulfilled each day
translation.es: Que se haga realidad cada día

translation.en: as you are on this beautiful journey of love.
translation.es: mientras recorren este hermoso camino de amor.

translation.en: Just a little heavy on the tongue.
Most white people do.
Can you believe this is happening?
Yep! [laughs]
Wow. They look so happy, huh?
-Yeah, they do. -[woman shouts]
Mr. and Mrs. Cohen.
translation.es: El señor y la señora Cohen.

translation.en: Mr. and Mrs. Mohammad-Cohen.
translation.es: El señor y la señora Mohammad-Cohen.

translation.en: Yep.
Ain't that a bitch!
